attributes.action: continue to keep a weekly rubbish collection
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the Government is planning on introducing a fourtnightly rubbish collection which could lead to an increased health risk. Evidence also shows that having a fourtnightly collection will not help increase the amount of rubbish we recycle.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
